dmca.title: URGENT: CEASE AND DESIST Unauthorized Use and Sale of Apple Computer Inc. Intellectua
dmca.body:
Dear eBay Seller itunes_cjb_net:

I am an attorney with the law firm Skadden & Affiliates, which has been retained by Apple Computer Inc. I am attaching a cease and desist letter relating to your unauthorized use and sale of Apple Computer Inc. intellectual property, which you are currently selling on eBay. I urge you to read the attached letter immediately, so that you may take any and all appropriate actions.

Complete compliance with all requests outlined in the attached letter will result in no actions whatsoever being taken against you or your partners.

This is a cease and desist notice.

Please reply to this email within forty-eight hours regarding your intentions of compliance.

Best regards.
[private]

---------------------------------------------------------
Attached:  198231_Apple_Computer_Inc_Cease_And_Desist.doc
---------------------------------------------------------


[private]
Internet: [private]@skaddenlaw.com

August 23, 2006

DELIVERED VIA ELECTRONIC-MAIL

RE: Unauthorized Use and Sale of Apple Computer Inc. Intellectual Property

Dear eBay Seller itunes_cjb_net:

Our law firm serves as counsel to Apple Computer Inc. ("Apple"), owner of all intellectual property rights in the iTunes Music Store (
